title: HOUR 1 - Chiefs-Raiders, NFL
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Chiefs-Raiders, NFL
description:
Colin looks at the Chiefs offense without star wide receiver Tyreek Hill and why they're still at the top of the league.

Defending Raiders head coach Josh McDaniels going for 2 and potentially costing his team the win

The NFL needs to fix the roughing the passer rule

 

Guest: Peter Schrager

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
